entry.title: Why Apigen Matters ?
entry.content: I have been working with different open-source projects for a while. Most of them utilizes phpdocumentator2 . I liked it for a while. But I have been looking at apigen, swami etc. Recently I started to make use of apigen extensively. What made me comfortable with apigen than phpdocumentator ? Certain times we may want to look into the code also to see the implementation . I am not sure may be there is an option in phpdocumentator that it can show the code when we click on a function / method. The code highlighting and is shown once we click on it. I like this feature the most. If you haven’t yet checked how the apigen generated api looks have a look into the one for the aura project which is at http://harikt.github.com/api More information on a href=“http://apigen.org>apigen.org
